name: Dont touch the wall
description:
W = UP     S = Down     A = Left     D = Right   Space = Shoot

This game is still in progress. The current features are the main mechanic of the game.

If you have any ides feel free to comment them down below.

I´ve updatet the game. Now it has the abiliy to shoot and it has nicer buttons.

I hope you like it :)
